Title: Mango Dreams
Writer: Mazahir Rahim (screenplay), Hamza Rahim (screenplay), John Upchurch (story)
Actors: Ram Gopal Bajaj, Pankaj Tripathi, Sameer Kochhar, Faraz Ahsan
Plot: A Hindu doctor with dementia and a Muslim auto rickshaw driver form an unlikely friendship as they cross India in search of the doctor's childhood home.
